Prices are guaranteed for 14 days. If an item you buy goes on sale within 14 days of purchase, we’ll honor the new price at your requestin the form of a Crocs gift card with a valid receipt, except as stated below for "Final Sale" items. The price adjustment policy applies to price changes that occur within the 14-day period following your purchase only. Price Adjustment Policy See return instructions. Paypal Note: At this time we are unable to credit Paypal orders when items are returned to a crocs owned store. If you made a purchase online using Paypal and are returning your item(s) to a crocs owned store, you will receive a crocs gift card in the amount of the return refund, redeemable at Crocs owned stores or at crocs.com.
